name: Asteroid Builder (Kenney Jam 2020)
description:
Submission for https://itch.io/jam/kenney-jam-2020

Sadly didn't have enough time to finish something with proper gameplay.

But for whoever wants to try out an asteroid solar panel and ore mining builder. Here ya go. :P

Controls: 

Move: WASD / QE or Right Mouse Button

Zoom: Mouse Wheel

Placement: Select a Structure. Left click to place down. Esc to cancel.
